2203.subject: HCOM
2203.descrlong:
Students are responsible for publishing the Otter Realm campus newspaper. Outcomes include learning journalistic writing and reporting techniques such as interviewing, information gathering, and writing news and feature stories, as well as media analysis skills. Students learn in a fast-paced, working newsroom environment to produce newspaper content. Instructor consent required.

[Prereq: (GE Areas A1 and A2 and A3) and (HCOM 385)]
